Emissary in Eastern Wastes


This is obviously a bugged, yet-to-be-fully-implemented mob. But it certainly is interesting in its current state. To find this (it will not show up on tracking):

- Stand on the dragon bridge in Eastern Wastelands, with your back to the Iceclad zone
- Cast 'Sense Summoned'
- Your target box will fill with red, but no mob name (see shot below), and you'll be pointed toward the mob
- It is invisible and no form of see-invis will show it to you; it's usually in the water to your left
- It hits for 127. A lot. And it seems to have a lot of hit points
- When it hits you, there is no mob name listed (see shot below)
- You can hit it back, and it doesn't appear to be very magic-resistant

Interesting, too, was the odd text message it spouted off at one point during the battle: 'Cannot open EWDepopEmissary'. Obviously EW is Eastern Wastelands. Depop, we know what that is. Thus it appears the mob itself, when fully implemented (if ever) will be... the Emissary?  It is kos, so there is no telling what the final function of this mob will be. Check it out sometime and see what you think!
